value:
It's hard to believe that in this world,
I could meet my father...when he was
around my age. Astonishing!

My friend Roy and I have known each
other a long time. We once went to
school together. He's so studious!

Thank you for all that you do. I feel
like we can accomplish just about
anything with you around!

The amazing Cecilia once said I have
a natural talent for magic. To me, that
meant I ought to work even harder!

So, you've never studied magic, but
you're a summoner with such great
power? You must be a natural!

Greetings, $Nu.$k$pI've come today to say hello.
And I hope that we will become
great friends in time!

How lovely! Now I can help
everyone that much more!

A good day! But I must keep
pushing myself.

I thought I was working hard
enough. Troubling.

I've gotten stronger! I hope it'd
make my father proud.

I'm Lilina, daughter of Hector, the
Marquess of Ostia. I'm still a student,
but I can use fire magic fairly well!

There's someone in my life whom
I dearly want to keep safe.$k$pThat is what has driven me to do my
best in all things. But now I realize
there's a limit to what I can do alone.$k$pWatching you, always working with
our allies, has shown me that.
People flock to you!$k$pAnd you're all the stronger for it.
You seem to share that very
quality with Roy...$k$pSo, I just wanted to say thank you.
I hope I'll never lose your kind support.
I know you'll never lose mine.
はいっ！
えいっ！
きゃああっ！
No...
I mustn't fail!
I call upon fire!
The magic is within!
Oh, you... Enough!
Please win...
Uhuhu
OH! Ah, hello there, friend!
Oh, you...! You're such a curious one!
Shall we chat? Just for a while. I know you have plenty to do.
I must really apply myself to studying magic!
I admire your abilities with magic. Really and truly!
What I want most is for the children of all worlds to live in peace. Oh, and to laugh, of course!
I have a good feeling that you and I will be fast friends!
Yes?
OK.
All right.
